name: engage-game
description: A videogame for Red Hat Summit 2017.

scripts.start: npm run launcher-server & npm run serve
scripts.leader-server-test: mongodb-runner start && parse-server --appId ENGAGE --masterKey ENGAGE --databaseURI mongodb://localhost/engage
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/client/* dist && babel src/client --out-dir dist --presets=env --ignore lib/*
